sentences.en: And he gave Rama Yade, a feisty 31 - year - old Senegalese , a human - rights post in the foreign ministry.
sentences.cn: 此外,他还让脾气暴躁的31岁 塞内加尔人 拉玛?亚德(RamaYade)在外交部掌管人权事务.

sentences.en: At 66, she was as feisty as ever.
sentences.cn: 66岁的她还和从前一样精神矍铄。

sentences.en: DiFranco charmed the audience with her feisty spirit.
sentences.cn: 迪芙兰蔻以其顽强的精神倾倒了观众。

sentences.en: From the start, he'd liked her long , thick hair, feisty sense of humor and fearlessness.
sentences.cn: 从一开始, 他就被她那浓密的秀发, 泼辣 、 幽默、无所畏惧的性情所打动.

sentences.en: He was a strong and a feisty old man.
sentences.cn: 他是个很坚强的倔老头.

sentences.en: Ms Madlala - Routledge was certainly feisty.
sentences.cn: 马德拉?若勒基的确精力充沛.

sentences.en: Our encounters are generally feisty affairs too.
sentences.cn: 我们的对碰一般也是轻易出现吵架的.

sentences.en: So it'll be a feisty game.
sentences.cn: 所以这将是一场艰苦的比赛.

sentences.en: The feisty, ambitious wannabes, grew bored and restless.
sentences.cn: 这群不安分的 、 野心勃勃的“想要”们变得烦躁不安、心绪不定起来.

sentences.en: The soldier looked incredulously at the feisty child.
sentences.cn: 士兵难以置信地看着这个异常顽强的孩子。

words.tran_cn: 活跃的；好争吵的；烦躁不安的

trans.tran_cn: 活跃的，好争吵的，精力充沛的，烦躁不安的
